npcs.name: a forlorn apparition
utterances: She's gone. Once again, I can rest here.
Vengeance and fury turn a person into... something they aren't. Shouldn't be. But sometimes... sometimes situations bring out that in us. All of us.
I will... try. I will watch for her. Try to keep her from returning once again. Thank you... for all you've done.
Perhaps... some rest. Yes. Some rest.

npcs.name: a Furious Spirit
utterances: I stood against our enemies dutifully, and this is my fate? How could he condemn me to this?
How could I not have seen what he was doing? Was I so blind that I allowed him to tear us apart?
He was my heart â€“ why would he do this to me? WHY??
How could he give her his favor? Were the gifts he granted me naught but false?
Are you here to stab me from the shadows as they did? Then come, and meet their same fate!
You will join them in their imprisonment! You will know naught but darkness and agony!
